segments.text: I see the open cabinets above the sink and the tempting cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the boy climbs the stool makes my stomach churn with anxiety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems so determined, yet oblivious to how risky this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Looking at the woman, her absorbed expression is shocking to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she understands that chaos is unfolding while she wipes that plate clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s anticipation adds a layer of sweetness to this scene, but it’s bittersweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This ordinary kitchen has turned into a stage for a potential disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
